Based on current published specifications accessed Sun Dec  1 11:26:47 PM UTC 2024

abbr.desc: Alternative label to use for the header cell when referencing the cell in other contexts
abbr.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

accept.desc: Hint for expected file type in file upload controls
accept.value_type: Set of comma-separated tokens* consisting of valid MIME type strings with no parameters or audio/*, video/*, or image/. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

accept-charset.desc: Character encodings to use for form submission

accesskey.desc: Keyboard shortcut to activate or focus element
accesskey.value_type: Ordered set of unique space-separated tokens, none of which are identical to another, each consisting of one code point in length

action.desc: URL to use for form submission
action.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

allow.desc: Permissions policy to be applied to the iframe's contents

allowfullscreen.desc: Whether to allow the iframe's contents to use requestFullscreen()

alpha.desc: Allow the color's alpha component to be set

alt.desc: Replacement text for use when images are not available
alt.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

as.desc: Potential destination for a preload request (for rel="preload" and rel="modulepreload")
as.value_type: Potential destination, for rel="preload"; script-like destination, for rel="modulepreload"

async.desc: Execute script when available, without blocking while fetching

autocapitalize.desc: Recommended autocapitalization behavior (for supported input methods)

autocomplete.desc: Default setting for autofill feature for controls in the form

autocomplete(2).value_type: Autofill field name and related tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

autocorrect.desc: Recommended autocorrection behavior (for supported input methods)

autofocus.desc: Automatically focus the element when the page is loaded

autoplay.desc: Hint that the media resource can be started automatically when the page is loaded

blocking.desc: Whether the element is potentially render-blocking
blocking.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

cite.desc: Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
cite.value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

class.desc: Classes to which the element belongs

color.desc: Color to use when customizing a site's icon (for rel="mask-icon")

colorspace.desc: The color space of the serialized color

cols.desc: Maximum number of characters per line
cols.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

colspan.desc: Number of columns that the cell is to span
colspan.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

content.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

coords.desc: Coordinates for the shape to be created in an image map
coords.value_type: Valid list of floating-point numbers. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

crossorigin.desc: How the element handles crossorigin requests

data.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

datetime.desc: Date and (optionally) time of the change
datetime.value_type: Valid date string with optional time

datetime(2).value_type: Valid month string, valid date string, valid yearless date string, valid time string, valid local date and time string, valid time-zone offset string, valid global date and time string, valid week string, valid non-negative integer, or valid duration string

decoding.desc: Decoding hint to use when processing this image for presentation

default.desc: Enable the track if no other text track is more suitable

dir.desc: The text directionality of the element

dir(2).desc: The text directionality of the element

dirname.desc: Name of form control to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission
dirname.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

disabled.desc: Whether the form control is disabled

disabled(2).desc: Whether the descendant form controls, except any inside legend, are disabled

download.desc: Whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its filename if so

enctype.desc: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

enterkeyhint.desc: Hint for selecting an enter key action

fetchpriority.desc: Sets the priority for fetches initiated by the element

for.desc: Associate the label with form control
for.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

for(2).desc: Specifies controls from which the output was calculated
for(2).value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

form.desc: Associates the element with a form element
form.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

formaction.desc: URL to use for form submission
formaction.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

formenctype.desc: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

formmethod.desc: Variant to use for form submission

formnovalidate.desc: Bypass form control validation for form submission

formtarget.value_type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

headers.desc: The header cells for this cell
headers.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

high.value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

href.value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

href(2).value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

href(3).value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

id.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

imagesizes.desc: Image sizes for different page layouts (for rel="preload")

imagesrcset.desc: Images to use in different situations, e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc. (for rel="preload")
imagesrcset.value_type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

inputmode.desc: Hint for selecting an input modality

integrity.desc: Integrity metadata used in Subresource Integrity checks [SRI]

is.value_type: Valid custom element name of a defined customized built-in element

ismap.desc: Whether the image is a server-side image map

itemid.desc: Global identifier for a microdata item
itemid.value_type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

itemprop.desc: Property names of a microdata item
itemprop.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of valid absolute URLs, defined property names, or text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

itemref.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

itemtype.desc: Item types of a microdata item
itemtype.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of valid absolute URLs. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

lang.value_type: Valid BCP 47 language tag or the empty string

list.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

loop.desc: Whether to loop the media resource

low.value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

max.value_type: Varies. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

max(2).value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

method.desc: Variant to use for form submission

min.value_type: Varies. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

min(2).value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

muted.desc: Whether to mute the media resource by default

name.desc: Name of the element to use for form submission and in the form.elements API
name.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

name(2).desc: Name of group of mutually-exclusive details elements
name(2).value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

name(3).desc: Name of form to use in the document.forms API
name(3).value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

name(4).value_type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

name(5).desc: Name of image map to reference from the usemap attribute
name(5).value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

name(6).value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

nomodule.desc: Prevents execution in user agents that support module scripts

nonce.desc: Cryptographic nonce used in Content Security Policy checks [CSP]

novalidate.desc: Bypass form control validation for form submission

open(2).desc: Whether the dialog box is showing

optimum.value_type: Valid floating-point number. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

pattern.desc: Pattern to be matched by the form control's value
pattern.value_type: Regular expression matching the JavaScript Pattern production

ping.value_type: Set of space-separated tokens consisting of valid non-empty URLs

placeholder.desc: User-visible label to be placed within the form control
placeholder.value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

playsinline.desc: Encourage the user agent to display video content within the element's playback area

popover.desc: Makes the element a popover element

popovertarget.desc: Targets a popover element to toggle, show, or hide
popovertarget.value_type: ID. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

popovertargetaction.desc: Indicates whether a targeted popover element is to be toggled, shown, or hidden

poster.desc: Poster frame to show prior to video playback
poster.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

preload.desc: Hints how much buffering the media resource will likely need

readonly.desc: Whether to allow the value to be edited by the user

readonly(2).desc: Affects willValidate, plus any behavior added by the custom element author

referrerpolicy.desc: Referrer policy for fetches initiated by the element

rel.desc: Relationship between the location in the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource
rel.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

rel(2).desc: Relationship between the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource
rel(2).value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

required.desc: Whether the control is required for form submission

rows.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

rowspan.desc: Number of rows that the cell is to span

sandbox.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of "allow-downloads""allow-forms""allow-modals""allow-orientation-lock""allow-pointer-lock""allow-popups""allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox""allow-presentation""allow-same-origin""allow-scripts""allow-top-navigation""allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation""allow-top-navigation-to-custom-protocols"

scope.desc: Specifies which cells the header cell applies to

selected.desc: Whether the option is selected by default

shadowrootclonable.desc: Sets clonable on a declarative shadow root

shadowrootdelegatesfocus.desc: Sets delegates focus on a declarative shadow root

shadowrootserializable.desc: Sets serializable on a declarative shadow root

shape.desc: The kind of shape to be created in an image map

size.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

sizes.value_type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of sizes. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

sizes(2).desc: Image sizes for different page layouts

span.desc: Number of columns spanned by the element
span.value_type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

spellcheck.desc: Whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked

src.value_type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

srcdoc.desc: A document to render in the iframe
srcdoc.value_type: The source of an iframe srcdoc document. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

srcset.desc: Images to use in different situations, e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc.
srcset.value_type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

step.desc: Granularity to be matched by the form control's value
step.value_type: Valid floating-point number greater than zero, or "any"

style.value_type: CSS declarations. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

tabindex.desc:
Whether the element is focusable and sequentially focusable, and
     the relative order of the element for the purposes of sequential focus navigation

target.value_type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

target(2).desc: Default navigable for hyperlink navigation and form submission
target(2).value_type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

target(3).value_type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

title(2).desc: Full term or expansion of abbreviation

title(3).desc: Description of pattern (when used with pattern attribute)

translate.desc: Whether the element is to be translated when the page is localized

type.desc: Hint for the type of the referenced resource

type(6).value_type: "module"; a valid MIME type string that is not a JavaScript MIME type essence match

usemap.desc: Name of image map to use
usemap.value_type: Valid hash-name reference. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

value.desc: Value to be used for form submission

value(2).value_type: Text. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

value(3).value_type: Varies. The actual rules are more complicated than indicated

value(4).desc: Ordinal value of the list item

wrap.desc: How the value of the form control is to be wrapped for form submission

writingsuggestions.desc: Whether the element can offer writing suggestions or not.
